marklogic.body:
[Eminem] And I would like to introduce myself Surprise! *beatboxes* Hi, it's Ike 'Bout to get my Ike on, icon, with a life supply Of wife beaters and my Nikes on And a white tee over that Iron Mike Lookin' fly tonight, feel like I might die from a spider bite Come back as Spiderman, Park my Peter inside her dyke Bitch actin' like she got fuckin' higher standards than Mya, right Had to pry her fingers Off with the motherfuckin' pliers Ice cream/I scream with the pliers, like "AAHHH!" ... Girl, you got a nice pair/pear, but you're plumb/plum stupid! So when I pull up in that Benz Don't try to pretend like you ain't interested to impress your stupid ass friends And refuse to get in woman, and get slammed on the ground and snap like a pool stick against Cement, if you suck a dick, pretend it's a musical instrument You get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow I can tell at first glance you're a ho, cause your pants are so tight When you dance with O. Trice, your implants explode So Cold the dykes, the chance of snow in San Francisco I'm from Detroit city, you livin' in animosity That's a fucked up state to be in, such an atrocity Look the way these random thoughts keep you in senseless mind babble "What me? Apologize? labrbrr" This is the way the rhyme unravels And I wouldn't fucking take it back if I time traveled!
For the people who are too slow to understand eminem in his prime
